caption.p: Treatment plan of corona virus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

tr.td: COVID-19 patients
Light or common COVID-19 patients
Manifestations accord with the appropriate criteria of The Diagnosis and Treatment plan of Corona Virus Disease 2019 (Tentative Seventh Edition) [ 46]
General treatment: 1.Support therapy 2.Monitoring life signs 3.Oxygen therapy 4. Antiviral drugs 5.Antibiotics when necessary
Severe or critical COVID-19 patients
1.General treatment 2.Respiratory support: mechanical ventilation, extracorporeal membrane oxygenation(ECMO) for acute respiratory distress syndrome patients
Patient with renal failure symptoms
Patient with disease progressed quickly
